DOC.brief_summary: The goal of this project is to examine the physical and psychological health benefits of a novel, telephone-delivered symptom management intervention for advanced lung cancer patients and their family caregivers.
DOC.brief_title: Telephone Support Program for Lung Cancer Patients and Their Family Caregivers
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of lung cancer Must be able to speak and read English No working phone service Does not have a family caregiver
